maqras.text: The desert Arabs said: we believe. Say: you did not believe, but say we surrendered (to you, and not yet to God), while the belief has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey God and His messenger, He would not reduce anything from your works. God is forgiving and merciful
Indeed the believers are those who believed in God and His messenger, then they did not doubt and they tried hard with their possessions and their lives in Godâ€™s way. They are the truthful ones
Say: do you inform God about your way of life while God knows whatever is in the skies and whatever is on the earth? And God knows everything
They consider it a favor to you that they submitted, say: do not consider your submission as a favor to me, but God favored you to guide you to the belief, if you are truthful
Indeed God knows the unseen (and secrets) of the skies and the earth. And God sees whatever you do
Qaf. By the glorious Quran
They are surprised that a warner came to them from them, so the disbelievers said: this is a strange thing
When we die and become dust (will we be raised)? This is an unlikely return
We definitely know what the earth reduces from them, and a book that keeps (track of everything) is with Us
No, but they denied the truth when it came to them, and they are in a state of confusion
Did they not look at the sky above them, that how We built it and beautified it, and it has no cracks
And We spread out the earth, and We placed firm mountains in it, and We grew all types of beautiful (plants) in it
An observation and a reminder for every repenting servant
And We sent down blessed rain from the sky, and with it We grew gardens and seed of the harvest
and tall palm trees having layered cluster (of dates)
as a provision for Our servants, and We gave life to a dead land with it. The coming out (of graves) is like that
People of Noah and inhabitants of Raas (the well) and Thamud denied before them
and Aad and Pharaoh and brothers of Lot
and inhabitants of the wood and people of Tubba (a Yemenite dynasty), all of them denied the messengers, so My threat (of punishment) was necessary
Were We tired by the first creation? No, but they are in doubt about the new creation
And We have certainly created the human being and We know what his soul seduces him to it, and We are closer to him than the jugular vein
when the two receivers (or recorders) sitting on the right and on the left receive (and record his works)
He does not speak a word unless there is an observer with him ready (to record)
And the agony of death comes in truth, which is what you were keeping away from it
And the trumpet is blown. That is the day of the threat
And every one comes with a driver (who steers him) and a witness
You were negligent of this, so We removed your cover from you, and today your eyesight is sharp
And his companion (angel) says: this is what is ready with me (record of his deeds)
Throw into hell every stubborn disbelievers
who prevented from the good, exceeded the limits, and was a doubter
the one who set up another god with God, so throw him into the severe punishment
